依靠拱技术开成的中央穹顶和四边的筒形拱成等臂十字,得名为希腊十字架。其内部空间的中心在中央穹顶下。 17. 抹角拱(Squinch):也称内角拱。为解决方形平面上覆盖.
大城市large city交角券squinch城市历史保护urban conservation
在穹隅的发展前,建筑师常采用叠涩拱或内角拱(Squinch)于四角以支撑建筑。穹隅的发明使得方形基座上可以搭建巨大的圆形穹顶。这是一个古罗马建筑师没有解决的问题.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 15th cent.: alteration of obsolete scunch, abbreviation of scuncheon
early 19th cent.: perhaps a blend of the verbs squeeze and pinch

means.word_mean: 1. a small arch built across the interior angle of two walls (usually to support a spire)
2. draw back, as with fear or pain;

sentences.sentence: "she flinched when they showed the slaughtering of the calf"
"The children squinted to frighten each other"

auth_sentence.content: Why did his shoulders squinch together and his floppy lips twist up at the corners?
